item.title: SDP solvers
item.description: Since LCToolbox nearly always reformulates a controller synthesis problems as a semidefinite program (SDP), you will need an appropriate solver for this. MATLAB’s Robust Control Toolbox offers ‘LMI Lab’. However, for some problem types it might be convenient to use more flexible solvers. LCToolbox formulates (nearly) all SDPs through YALMIP and thus supports all solvers that YALMIP interfaces. A complete list can be found here.
